Method Detail

getUntreatedDiagnoses

public DiagnosisInfo[] getUntreatedDiagnoses()
                                      throws NotLoggedInException,
                                             NoOpenedPatientFileException
Gets a list of untreated diagnoses for the currently opened patient

Returns:
an array of DiagnosisInfos representing untreated diagnoses
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - the doctor is not logged in
NoOpenedPatientFileException - the doctor has no patientfile opened

getTreatmentArguments

public PublicArgument[] getTreatmentArguments(String treatment)
                                       throws NotLoggedInException,
                                              NotAFactoryException
Gets the arguments to the creation of a treatment

Parameters:
treatment - the type of treatment to be created
Returns:
an array of PublicArguments which, when answered, can be used in the creation of a new Treatment-object of given type
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - the doctor is not logged in
NotAFactoryException - the given type does not exist in this world

makeTreatment

public String makeTreatment(String treatment,
                            PublicArgument[] args,
                            DiagnosisInfo diagnosis)
                     throws NotLoggedInException,
                            ArgumentConstraintException,
                            NotAFactoryException,
                            InvalidDiagnosisException,
                            WrongArgumentListException,
                            ArgumentNotAnsweredException,
                            NoOpenedPatientFileException,
                            StockNotFoundException,
                            ItemNotReservedException,
                            ItemNotFoundException,
                            ArgumentIsNullException
Creates a new treatment of the given type

Parameters:
treatment - the type of treatment to create
args - the arguments to the creation of the new treatment
diagnosis - the diagnosis to which this treatment belongs
Returns:
the details of the newly created treatment
Throws:
NotAFactoryException - the given type does not exist in this world
NotLoggedInException - the doctor is not logged in
ArgumentNotAnsweredException - one or more of the given arguments was not answered
WrongArgumentListException - the given list of arguments did not match the type of treatment
ArgumentConstraintException - one or more of the given arguments was incorrect
InvalidDiagnosisException - the given diagnosis was not found in this world
NoOpenedPatientFileException - the doctor currently has no opened patientfile
ArgumentIsNullException - the given array of PublicArguments was null
StockNotFoundException - somehow this world exists without plaster
ItemNotFoundException - the reserved item has somehow disappeared from the stock
ItemNotReservedException - somehow the plaster was not reserved either though we just did that the statement before
ArgumentIsNullException - somehow plaster was not reserved and NoItemsAvailable didn't get caught

getAvailableTreatments

public String[] getAvailableTreatments()
Gets a list of the available treatments

Returns:
an array of strings containing the names of treatments

getAvailableMedicationItems

public String[] getAvailableMedicationItems()
Gets a list of the available medication items

Returns:
an array of strings containing the names of medication items
